subject: Heath Maguire, you’re in—it’s time to start sending
preview: View in browser                                                               Hi Heath Maguire,                               It's great to see you completed your account setup-now it's sending time!

full_threads.body:
View in browser
Hi Heath Maguire,

It's great to see you completed your account setup-now it's sending time!

Choose between our flexible sending options to integrate MailerSend into your stack:
Check out the guide on setting up MailerSend SMTP →
Simple API, advanced features +

For advanced functionality and features, integrate MailerSend directly into your stack with our flexible API. Choose you favorite programming language from our 7 official libraries for NodeJS, Python, Java, Laravel, PHP, Go, and Ruby. Refer to our comprehensive developers' documentation, check out the Knowledge Base, and give us a shout if you need any assistance.
Check out our API →
No code, no problem +

MailerSend offers plenty of integrations to connect with your favorite apps and automate your workflows. Integrate directly with platforms such as WooCommerce or connect with thousands of apps using automation tools like Zapier, Make and Pabbly Connect.
Discover our integrations →
Easy peasy SMTP +

Send emails straight away from your app or website with our secure SMTP relay-just enter your credentials! Once you verify your domain, head to the Domains page, select the domain, scroll down to SMTP and enable it. Your unique SMTP credentials will automatically appear-all you need to do is head over to your CMS and plug them in.
Check out the guide on setting up MailerSend SMTP →
Simple API, advanced features +

For advanced functionality and features, integrate MailerSend directly into your stack with our flexible API. Choose you favorite programming language from our 7 official libraries for NodeJS, Python, Java, Laravel, PHP, Go, and Ruby. Refer to our comprehensive developers' documentation, check out the Knowledge Base, and give us a shout if you need any assistance.
Check out our API →
No code, no problem +

MailerSend offers plenty of integrations to connect with your favorite apps and automate your workflows. Integrate directly with platforms such as WooCommerce or connect with thousands of apps using automation tools like Zapier, Make and Pabbly Connect.
Discover our integrations →

Happy sending!
Integrate MailerSend
What's next?

It's time to send your first templated email!

To send a templated email:

  1. Create the template you want to send, for example, for a forgotten password or a confirmation email.
  2. Add all the variables you'll need with or {{advanced personalization}}.
  3. Add your logo, and customize the template to your brand guidelines.
  4. Save and copy the template ID.
  5. Go to your domain, add a new API token or enable the SMTP credentials.
  6. Depending on your use case, use the following instructions:
Find examples here
Send with WooCommerce +

Go to your WooCommerce admin space, add the official MailerSend plugin, create as many templates as you need, copy their IDs on your plugin and you're all set!
Download the plugin
Send with your favorite language +

We regularly update our SDKs for them to be on par with our API. You can find plenty of examples on Github for all our endpoints.
Check the API reference
Send with WordPress +

Go to your WordPress admin space, add the official MailerSend plugin, enter your SMTP credentials and you're ready!
Download the plugin
Send with Zapier +

Go to Zapier, create a Zap with the "Send an email based on a template" action, add the API token and the template ID, and any variable from your trigger!
Find examples here
Send with WooCommerce +

Go to your WooCommerce admin space, add the official MailerSend plugin, create as many templates as you need, copy their IDs on your plugin and you're all set!
Download the plugin
Send with your favorite language +

We regularly update our SDKs for them to be on par with our API. You can find plenty of examples on Github for all our endpoints.
Check the API reference
Send with WordPress +

Go to your WordPress admin space, add the official MailerSend plugin, enter your SMTP credentials and you're ready!
Download the plugin
